UpdateLog.description:
<title>Recent News</title><font>Small</font> I've created a community managed google spreadsheet for translations, so if you want to help fill out one of the languages please DM me on discord and I can add you. Feel free to join even if the language you know is already filled out, I may need to edit or add entries in the future. Thanks! :) <title>Bug Fixes</title><font>Tiny</font> - Fixed bug where vehicles at corner of maps can clip out of bounds and be deleted.
- Fixed bug where rotating while targeting landing would change the rotation of the vehicle actively.
- Fixed bug where vehicle would pull incorrect landing properties while targeting.
- Fixed bug where patterns would copy from incorrect rotation for material generation.
- Fixed bug where aerial vehicles were unable to offer gifts.
- Fixed bug where pawns would not transfer to inventory upon death inside vehicles.
- Fixed bug with turret recaching status not triggering on pawn death.
- Compatibility fix for TraderGen.
- Compatibility fix for RimHUD.
- Fixed bug where turrets would rotate incorrectly in UI at UIScale > 1.
- Fixed bug where reserving handlers would get cleared immediately, allowing multiple pawns to enter the same role beyond the limit.
- Fixed bug where aerial vehicles would ignore situations that should prevent the vehicle from launching on the world map.
- Fixed bug where loading save file that saved while turret was shooting throws an exception, causing the vehicle to not load in.
- Fixed bug where vehicles could still be drafted with out of fuel. <title>Performance Improvements</title><font>Tiny</font>
<title>Additional Changes</title><font>Tiny</font> - Added additional configuration options for runway restrictions.
- Changed default color palettes.
- Added toggle for patterns and skins displayed.
- Added >M options for loading cargo into vehicles.
- Default auto-refuel percentage changed from 30% to 100%, meaning all vehicles will request to be refueled to full capacity if they are currently undrafted.
- Added extra info when trading with AerialVehicle at settlement.
- Cleaned up all translation files and added spreadsheet for tracking all translations. <title>Final Notes</title><font>Tiny</font> Please report any issues you find <link>https://discord.gg/zXDyfWQ</link>(discord server).
